meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alison Whitney Russ Nixon Emeric Schultz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1058.

td.p: Alison Whitney, a preschool director & teacher from Orlando, Florida
Russ Nixon, a technical consultant from New Jersey
Emeric Schultz, a chemistry professor from Bloomsburg, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,700)

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
AUTOMOBILE NAMES
QUOTES
MUSIC TRIVIA
HINTS FROM HELOISE
GLORY THAT WAS GREECE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The elephant is the largest land animal by weight; this animal is 2nd')

tr.td: ANIMALS
(Alex: We love 'em!)
The elephant is the largest land animal by weight; this animal is 2nd
Emeric
Russ
Alison
2nd place: Trip to Roseland Ranch in Stanfordville, New York
3rd place: Krementz 14-carat gold signet rings
New champion: $3,599
Emeric
Russ
Alison

(including 1 DD),
